name: Jumper Magic
description:
6 different maps, 6 different puzzle.
Pass the doors, get rid of enemies or destroy them.
Find the password, complete the corridors, solve the puzzles.
If you fall down you start again.
Basic controllers.
First Person Perspective for a more enjoyable game.
Enjoy the unique scenery and graphics.

We find our player with a lot of strengths in different maps and different puzzles. Try to overcome all obstacles and end the game. Jump, interact, attack, use your mind if necessary. Be cautious instead of fast if you want to be successful.
